content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. Can you tell me what you are looking for in terms of monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Please propose a price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Understood. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would propose a monthly rental price of 800 Euros. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, this is within my budget. I agree to the price of 800 Euros. Thank you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I will send you the rental agreement for you to review and sign. Once you sign and return it, the rental period will begin. Is there anything else you need to know or discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
